tweaks.title: Hide "Related" Stories and Pages
tweaks.description: When you click a link from the news feed or Like a page post, Facebook inserts a block of other things you might like. Enable this Tweak to hide those blocks.

tweaks.title: Hide Notification Bubble
tweaks.description: When a new notification is added, it is displayed in the lower left corner. Enable this tweak to hide it.

tweaks.title: Force Chat Popup To Default Colors
tweaks.description: Chat colors can be customized by people in the chat, causing the popups to be different colors. This tweak restores all chat popup panels to the default blue color.

tweaks.title: Lock left column
tweaks.description: Force the left column to stay in place and not scroll with the screen.

tweaks.title: Remove Status Background Colors
tweaks.description: Facebook recently introduced a feature to allow users to select a background color for their status updates. This tweak removes the background and returns the posts to normal.
